<h1>Begin Your Digital Odyssey</h1>
<p>The first step toward digital supremacy starts with a single message. Whether you're nurturing the seeds of an AI dream or ready to unleash a full-scale technological revolution, our team of digital architects awaits your call to adventure.</p>

<section class="section">
<div class="contact-card">
<form id="contact-form" action="https://formspree.io/f/mwpqavvz" method="POST">
  <input type="text"   name="name"    placeholder="Your Name"   required />
  <input type="email"  name="email"   placeholder="Your Email"  required />
  <textarea name="message" placeholder="Your Message" rows="5" required></textarea>

  <!-- Helpful extras -->
  <input type="hidden" name="subject" value="New message from Eliora Tech Solutions" />
  <input type="text"   name="_gotcha" style="display:none" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off" />

  <button type="submit">Send Message</button>
  <p id="form-status" class="form-status" aria-live="polite"></p>
</form>
</div>
